sourcesContent:
export default {
    alignContent: {
        "0": "auto",
        "1": "flexStart",
        "2": "center",
        "3": "flexEnd",
        "4": "stretch",
        "5": "baseline",
        "6": "spaceBetween",
        "7": "spaceAround",
        "8": "count",
    },
    alignItems: {
        "0": "auto",
        "1": "flexStart",
        "2": "center",
        "3": "flexEnd",
        "4": "stretch",
        "5": "baseline",
        "6": "spaceBetween",
        "7": "spaceAround",
        "8": "count",
    },
    alignSelf: {
        "0": "auto",
        "1": "flexStart",
        "2": "center",
        "3": "flexEnd",
        "4": "stretch",
        "5": "baseline",
        "6": "spaceBetween",
        "7": "spaceAround",
        "8": "count",
    },
    display: { "0": "flex", "1": "none", "2": "count" },
    flexDirection: { "0": "column", "1": "columnReverse", "2": "row", "3": "rowReverse", "4": "count" },
    flexWrap: { "0": "noWrap", "1": "wrap", "2": "wrapReverse", "3": "count" },
    justifyContent: {
        "0": "flexStart",
        "1": "center",
        "2": "flexEnd",
        "3": "spaceBetween",
        "4": "spaceAround",
        "5": "spaceEvenly",
        "6": "count",
    },
    overflow: { "0": "visible", "1": "hidden", "2": "scroll", "3": "count" },
    positionType: { "0": "relative", "1": "absolute", "2": "count" },
}

export default {
    positionType: 0,
    positionTop: NaN,
    positionBottom: NaN,
    positionLeft: NaN,
    positionRight: NaN,
    alignContent: 1,
    alignItems: 4,
    alignSelf: 0,
    flexDirection: 0,
    flexWrap: 0,
    justifyContent: 0,
    marginTop: NaN,
    marginBottom: NaN,
    marginLeft: NaN,
    marginRight: NaN,
    flexBasis: NaN,
    flexGrow: 0,
    flexShrink: 0,
    width: NaN,
    height: NaN,
    minWidth: NaN,
    minHeight: NaN,
    maxWidth: NaN,
    maxHeight: NaN,
    aspectRatio: NaN,
    borderTop: NaN,
    borderBottom: NaN,
    borderLeft: NaN,
    borderRight: NaN,
    overflow: 0,
    display: 0,
    paddingTop: NaN,
    paddingBottom: NaN,
    paddingLeft: NaN,
    paddingRight: NaN,
}
